entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he'.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: A person in the room with Harry, referred to as 'she'.

entities.name: bathilda
entities.description: An older woman who is helping Harry, referred to as 'she'.

entities.name: the thief
entities.description: A person whose photograph is being hidden by Harry.

relationships.description: Harry walks out of the room without Hermione seeing him.
Harry slips a photograph into his jacket while Bathilda is not looking at him.
Harry hides the silver-framed photograph of the unknown thief inside his jacket.
